Name: Swingy Sword
About the game: Swingy Sword is a casual 3D fighting game where you fight to the death against up to 4 of your friends in 6 unique game modes. The main goal of Swingy Sword is to make the controls as challenging as possible while still being exciting to play. Example: You use the 2 joysticks to move the legs individually and to swing your sword you press and hold one of the bumpers and press the D-Pad in the direction you want to swing. If you like party games and you like games with Octodad style controls, you'll love Swingy Sword .
